official_title: A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to provide a qualified immunity for certain officers and employees of the Tennessee Valley Authority.

summary.text: Amends the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to provide immunity from civil suit to officers and employees of the Tennessee Valley Authority to the extent such persons have reasonable grounds to support their belief that their conduct in the course of office (or employment) was performed in good faith.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 to provide a qualified immunity for certain officers and employees of the Tennessee Valley Authority.
